titles.title: Giving Reductions to Energy Efficient New Buildings Act
GREEN Buildings Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase and extend the energy efficient commercial buildings deduction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/25/2007--Introduced. Giving Reductions to Energy Efficient New Buildings Act or the GREEN Buildings Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the allowable amount of the tax deduction for energy efficient commercial building costs; and (2) extend such deduction through 2013.
